text: This time last year, the world watched a nervous Prince George tightly holding his father's hand as he made his way to his first day of school. With a then - pregnant Kate Middleton at home due to extreme morning sickness, Prince William and his eldest son to school waved for the cameras as they entered the school gates before posing for the tot's official first day photograph. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below On Thursday, the five - year - old will return to Thomas â€™ s Academy in Battersea for his first day of Year 1, but photographers and journalists have not been invited to report of this week's historic event.
